name: The Land Of Peace
description: May peace be upon the land created for peace, but have not witnessed peace ever. Amid all the massacres happening in my region, I felt the responsibility, as an NFT artist, to take action at least with delivering a message of peace through the platforms that I use on daily basis. Hoping to spark a flame or a simply tell the world that we are here, and we shall be recognized.  This piece is a digital work, displaying the pain in this kids eyes, looking up for only one thing, PEACE, written in Arabic calligraphy, with the Aqsa mosque, Jerusalem. One of the world's most holly places.
